_meta.source: Researched from TripAdvisor, Viator, Alaska.org, and local guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers Anchorage metro and key attractions including Matanuska Glacier, Portage Glacier, and Girdwood

label_overrides.alaska-wildlife-conservation-center: Wildlife Center (30 min south - TOP RATED)

transit_routes.name: Whittier Cruise Transfer
transit_routes.note: Park Connection, ACT, and other operators. Through Anton Anderson Memorial Tunnel.

transit_routes.name: Seward Cruise Transfer
transit_routes.note: Park Connection and other operators via Seward Highway.

transit_routes.name: Alaska Railroad (Seward)
transit_routes.note: Scenic coastal route. GoldStar glass-domed cars recommended.

transit_routes.name: Alaska Railroad (Whittier)
transit_routes.note: Late departure (6:45 PM). Limited Whittier infrastructure for day wait.

transit_routes.name: Anchorage Trolley City Tour
transit_routes.note: Mid-May through mid-September. Covers Earthquake Park, Lake Hood, Railroad Depot.

featured_experiences.name: Glacier View Wildlife Adventure
featured_experiences.note: Consistently top-rated tour combining wildlife and scenery.

featured_experiences.name: Matanuska Glacier Ice Walk
featured_experiences.note: Alaska's largest road-accessible glacier. Guided tours required.

featured_experiences.name: Flightseeing with Glacier Landing
featured_experiences.note: Weather dependent. Book in advance during cruise season.

featured_experiences.name: Bear Viewing Day Trip
featured_experiences.note: Premium experience ($700+). Bucket-list for wildlife enthusiasts.
